About.Description1: I build secure, high-performance backend systems and handle complex data operations end-to-end. My expertise spans Python frameworks like Django, Flask, and FastAPI, along with ASP.NET for enterprise-grade solutions. I design RESTful APIs, integrate with Angular frontends, and ensure seamless communication between systems.
About.Description2: As a freelancer, I work with clients globally to deliver backend and data-driven solutions tailored to their needs. I thrive in remote environments, collaborating effectively across time zones, and delivering scalable, production-ready systems.

Skills.Summary: I've built deep technical expertise through years of real-world, hands-on development and data work.

TechStack.Specialties: Backend APIs . ETL Pipelines . Data Migration . System Integration . Remote Collaboration

Resume.Objective: Motivated freelance developer with hands-on experience in backend development and data engineering, seeking a full-time role to apply my skills in building scalable APIs, designing ETL pipelines, and managing complex data migration workflows. Eager to contribute to a collaborative team environment and deliver reliable, data-driven backend solutions.
Resume.Summary: Innovative and deadline-driven Backend Developer and Data Engineer with 16+ years of experience building scalable web applications, developing API-driven backend systems, and executing end-to-end data migration and transformation workflows from initial architecture to final deployment.

Educations.Desc: A dynamic academic journey named MCA flows through my career path, enriching it with essential knowledge in programming, system design, and data management.
IT flows through my academic path, supplying me with essential knowledge in programming, networking, and information systems-fueling my passion for technology and problem-solving.

Educations.University: Hindu Institute of Techincal Approved by AICTE
Educations.Desc: IT flows through my learning journey, equipping me with essential computer knowledge and practical skills that laid the groundwork for my career in IT.

Service.Title: Great pains are taken to ensure smooth service. Responsibilities are followed through even when challenges arise. We are committed to quality and integrity. Every client matters. No one is left behind, and support is always provided. We stand by our work, even in complex or difficult situations.

Contact.Title: Have a question or want to work together? Feel free to drop me a message. I'd love to hear from you!
